Posts.Content: On 7/12/2007 Phiza wrote: I've been on Arimidex for almost 4 years along with joint pains mostly in the hand and wrist I fractured.  Will this pain go away after I'm off the Arimidex or is it already too late?  I've heard of such joint pain being associated with chemo. Did you have chemo too?
Posts.Title: arimidex
